doc.title: Fashionable Wife
doc.plot: Young, modern and fluent Natwar has hope of marrying a cultured and religious girl. He does so but does not know if he has taken the right decision. His mother encouraged him during this situation. But after a few months after there marriage with his wife, he started to notice that she appears to be edgy as she does not care a bit about the household chores but is only interested in dressing and attending day-night party. How long will this go on? What will be the outcome of Natwar's behavior towards his wife?
